titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a refundable income tax credit for the recycling of hazardous wastes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/14/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a refundable income tax credit of two cents per pound of hazardous waste recycled by the taxpayer.
